summary: A ruthless businessman's payoff to the Belgian mafia is intercepted by his revenge-seeking former protegees, launching a deadly war of violence and double-dealing.
cast: Jason Wing|Bruce Payne|Sean Cronin|Sebastien Foucan|Courtney Winston|Jermaine Curtis Liburd|Simon Pengelly|Ashley R Woods|Terence Anderson|Danny Cutler|Katya Greer|Nick Orchard|Manveer Sohal|Kate Davies-Speak|Tobias Jon|Fredi 'Kruga' Nwaka|Richad Ferron|Thaer Al-Shayei|Marcin Wenderlich|Gemma Reynolds|Christopher Vowles|Jerone Burton|Rapman|Kathryn Carmichael|Carlos Martins|Jonathan Cox|Levi James|Aaron Georgio Anderson|Sean Earl McPherson|Briano Williams|Nina Takel|Joel Andre|Wesley Chipato|Max Clendaniel|David Doe|Zahid Fayyaz|Gemma Headley|Catie Hurst|Kat Ketley|Josh Llewelyn|Tony Manders|Aksar Miah|Sipho Mnkanku|Russell Msakwa|Clova Perez-Corral|Josh Reid|Solomon Sanneh|Norman Sinclair|George Thompson|Donavan Whiskers
director: Director: Jake L. Reid (as Jake Reid)
title: The Antwerp Dolls
